#labels Featured
=JBookShelf 0.6b3=

[http://jbookshelf.googlecode.com/files/jbookshelf-0.6b3.zip Download for all platforms] 

[http://code.google.com/p/jbookshelf/wiki/Screenshots Screenshots]

==Changes==

 * Viewer
   * Every viewer is opened in a separate process
   * Viewer remembers the last opened position
   * Notes can be displayed 
     * locally - near position they belong to
     * globally - table with all notes allows navigation to their positions
   * PDF-viewer provides page thumbnails
   * HTML-viewer can browse external links
   * External page can be saved as new book while browsing

==Fixed==
  
   * [http://code.google.com/p/jbookshelf/issues/detail?id=133 Syncronized scaling in two-page layout]

==Known issues==

 * [http://code.google.com/p/jbookshelf/issues/list?can=2&q=&sort=milestone&colspec=ID%20Type%20Status%20Priority%20Milestone%20Owner%20Summary Issues]

   * PDF page text extraction

   * Authors and categories renaming
 * Misc

   * Book info form displays book file info

=JBookShelf 0.5b0=

[http://jbookshelf.googlecode.com/files/jbookshelf-linux-0.5b0.zip Download for Linux] 
[http://jbookshelf.googlecode.com/files/jbookshelf-windows-0.5b0.zip Download for Windows]

[http://code.google.com/p/jbookshelf/wiki/Screenshots Screenshots]

==Changes==

 * Moved back to Java Swing [http://code.google.com/p/jbookshelf/issues/detail?id=81 see]
 * Memory storage and xml persistence using EMF replaced with DB persistence using [http://www.h2database.com/ H2 DB] and Hibernate
 * Model simplyfied
 * GUI and features review
 * Huge code reorganizing

==Fixed==

 * Opening the file zipped with a nonsystem encoding may cause an error

==Known issues==

 * [http://code.google.com/p/jbookshelf/issues/list Issues]
